info.description: High-performance AI gateway routing requests to multiple LLM providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, Groq, xAI, Ollama). Drop-in OpenAI-compatible API.
info.title: GOModel API

get.summary: Get conversation thread around an audit log entry
List all registered models with provider info

parameters.description: Grouping interval: daily, weekly, monthly, yearly (default daily)
parameters.name: interval

parameters.description: Search across model, provider, request_id, provider_id
parameters.name: search

200.description: JSON response or SSE stream when stream=true

error_message.description: Error details (message can be long, so kept in JSON)

request_body.description:
Optional bodies (when LOGGING_LOG_BODIES=true)
Stored as interface{} so MongoDB serializes as native BSON documents (queryable/readable)
instead of BSON Binary (base64 in Compass)

request_body_too_big_to_handle.description: Body capture status flags (set when body exceeds 1MB limit)

request_headers.description:
Optional headers (when LOGGING_LOG_HEADERS=true)
Sensitive headers are auto-redacted

data.description: Data contains flexible request/response information as JSON

duration_ns.description: DurationNs is the request duration in nanoseconds

id.description: ID is a unique identifier for this log entry (UUID)

request_id.description: Extracted fields for efficient filtering (indexed in relational DBs)

timestamp.description: Timestamp is when the request started

metadata.description:
Metadata holds optional enrichment data (display name, pricing, capabilities, etc.).
May be nil if the model was not found in the external registry.

effort.description:
Effort controls how much reasoning effort the model should use.
Valid values are "low", "medium", and "high".

input.description: string or []ResponsesInputItem â€” see docs for array form

include_usage.description:
IncludeUsage requests token usage information in streaming responses.
When true, the final streaming chunk will include usage statistics.
